mapper.select: SELECT SEQ , ID , NAME , AUTH_CODE , MEMBER_TYPE , MEMBER_STATUS , USE_YN FROM itkey_dev.member WHERE ID = #{id} AND PASSWORD = #{password} AND USE_YN = 'Y'

/*fn : gnb메뉴 리스트 - getGnbMenuList */ SELECT A.MENU_SEQ AS menuSeq , A.MENU_CODE AS menuCode , A.MENU_SITE AS menuSite , A.MENU_NAME AS menuName , A.MENU_PARENT_CODE AS menuParentCode , A.MENU_LEVEL AS menuLevel , A.MENU_ORDER AS menuOrder , A.MENU_USE_YN AS menuUseYn , A.MENU_TYPE AS menuType , A.MENU_URL AS menuUrl , A.MENU_CONN_WAY AS menuConnWay , A.MENU_DESC AS menuDesc FROM MENU A WHERE A.MENU_LEVEL = 1 AND A.MENU_SITE = 'A' AND A.MENU_USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY A.MENU_ORDER
